participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Introspective and emotionally expressive, Ethan tends to feel deeply and often uses music as an outlet for his emotions.
participant_1.background: I need to get drunk to lower my inhibitions. I did not finish college. I value my privacy most of all. I wake up at 5:30 am and practice my music for an hour before my family wakes up. My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, Lila is passionate about nature and enjoys capturing the beauty of the world through her photography.
participant_2.background: I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field. I went kayaking on a beautiful lake during my last vacation. My favorite music genre is classic rock. I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors. I met a group of amazing people from all over the world who shared my passion for adventure.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a musician, and I'm always looking to meet new people.
Nice to meet you! I'm a wildlife photographer.
That's awesome! I love going hiking and camping, but I've never been wildlife photography.
It's a lot of fun! You get to see some amazing animals in their natural habitat.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely going to have to give it a try.
You should! It's a great way to get outside and explore nature.
Where are some of your favorite places to go wildlife photography?
I love going to national parks. There's so much wildlife to see, and the scenery is always beautiful.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to a national park.
You should! They're the perfect place to get away from it all and relax.
I will! Thanks for the advice
